tool_description: Access cryptocurrency data such as price, market cap, volume, developer stats, social activity, and more from over 4000 cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, EOS, Grin, Stellar, and more!
name: CoinGecko
title: CoinGecko

api_list.name: /exchanges/{id}
api_list.description: Get exchange volume in BTC and top 100 tickers only

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: pass the exchange id (can be obtained from /exchanges/list) eg. binance

api_list.name: /events
api_list.description: Get events, paginated by 100

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: country_code of event (eg. ‘US’). use /api/v3/events/countries for list of country_codes

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: type of event (eg. ‘Conference’). use /api/v3/events/types for list of types

optional_parameters.name: from_date
optional_parameters.description: lists events after this date yyyy-mm-dd

optional_parameters.name: to_date
optional_parameters.description: lists events before this date yyyy-mm-dd (set upcoming_events_only to false if fetching past events)

optional_parameters.name: upcoming_events_only
optional_parameters.description: lists only upcoming events.  true, false

api_list.name: /events/countries
api_list.description: Get list of event countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coingecko.p.rapidapi.com/events/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coingecko.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /coins/markets
api_list.description: Use this to obtain all the coins market data (price, market cap, volume)

required_parameters.name: vs_currency
required_parameters.description: The target currency of market data (usd, eur, jpy, etc.)

optional_parameters.name: price_change_percentage
optional_parameters.description: Include price change percentage in 1h, 24h, 7d, 14d, 30d, 200d, 1y (eg. '1h,24h,7d' comma-separated, invalid values will be discarded)

optional_parameters.name: sparkline
optional_parameters.description: Include sparkline 7 days data (eg. true, false)

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: Total results per page. Between 1 to 250

optional_parameters.name: ids
optional_parameters.description: The ids of the coin, comma separated crytocurrency symbols (base). refers to /coins/list. When left empty, returns numbers the coins observing the params limit and start

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: sort results by field. valid values: market_cap_desc, gecko_desc, gecko_asc, market_cap_asc, market_cap_desc, volume_asc, volume_desc

api_list.name: /ping
api_list.description: Check API server status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coingecko.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coingecko.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /coins/{id}/tickers
api_list.description: Get coin tickers (paginated to 100 items)

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: pass the coin id (can be obtained from /coins/list) eg. bitcoin

api_list.name: /simple/price
api_list.description: Get the current price of any cryptocurrencies in any other supported currencies that you need.

required_parameters.name: ids
required_parameters.description: id of coins, comma-separated if querying more than 1 coin *refers to coins/list

required_parameters.name: vs_currencies
required_parameters.description: vs_currency of coins, comma-separated if querying more than 1 vs_currency *refers to simple/supported_vs_currencies

optional_parameters.name: include_last_updated_at
optional_parameters.description: true/false to include last_updated_at of price

api_list.name: /coins/{id}/market_chart
api_list.description: Get historical market data include price, market cap, and 24h volume (granularity auto)

required_parameters.name: vs_currency
required_parameters.description: The target currency of market data (usd, eur, jpy, etc.)

required_parameters.name: days
required_parameters.description: Data up to number of days ago (eg. 1,14,30,max)

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: pass the coin id (can be obtained from /coins) eg. bitcoin

api_list.name: /exchanges/list
api_list.description: List all supported markets id and name (no pagination required)
api_list.code:

url = "https://coingecko.p.rapidapi.com/exchanges/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coingecko.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /coins/{id}
api_list.description: Get current data (name, price, market, ... including exchange tickers) for a coin

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: pass the coin id (can be obtained from /coins) eg. bitcoin

optional_parameters.name: localization
optional_parameters.description: Include all localized languages in response (true/false)

optional_parameters.name: sparkline
optional_parameters.description: Include sparkline 7 days data (eg. true, false)

api_list.name: /coins/{id}/contract/{contract_address}
api_list.description: Get coin info from contract address

required_parameters.name: contract_address
required_parameters.description: Token’s contract address

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Asset platform (only ethereum is supported at this moment)

api_list.name: /coins/{id}/status_updates
api_list.description: Get status updates for a given coin

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: pass the coin id (can be obtained from /coins) eg. bitcoin

api_list.name: /exchange_rates
api_list.description: Get BTC-to-Currency exchange rates
api_list.code:

url = "https://coingecko.p.rapidapi.com/exchange_rates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coingecko.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /coins/{id}/market_chart/range
api_list.description: Get historical market data include price, market cap, and 24h volume within a range of timestamp (granularity auto)

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: From date in UNIX Timestamp (eg. 1392577232)

required_parameters.name: vs_currency
required_parameters.description: The target currency of market data (usd, eur, jpy, etc.)

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: To date in UNIX Timestamp (eg. 1422577232)

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: pass the coin id (can be obtained from /coins) eg. bitcoin

api_list.name: /exchanges/{id}/status_updates
api_list.description: Get status updates for a given exchange (beta)

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: pass the exchange id (can be obtained from /exchanges/list) eg. binance

api_list.name: /coins/list
api_list.description: List all supported coins id, name and symbol (no pagination required)

api_list.name: /exchanges/{id}/tickers
api_list.description: Get exchange tickers (paginated)

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: pass the exchange id (can be obtained from /exchanges/list) eg. binance

api_list.name: /status_updates
api_list.description: List all status_updates with data (description, category, created_at, user, user_title and pin)

optional_parameters.name: project_type
optional_parameters.description: Filtered by Project Type (eg. coin, market). If left empty returns both status from coins and markets.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Filtered by category (eg. general, milestone, partnership, exchange_listing, software_release, fund_movement, new_listings, event)

api_list.name: /coins/{id}/history
api_list.description: Get historical data (name, price, market, stats) at a given date for a coin

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date of data snapshot in dd-mm-yyyy eg. 30-12-2017

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: pass the coin id (can be obtained from /coins) eg. bitcoin

optional_parameters.name: localization
optional_parameters.description: Set to false to exclude localized languages in response

api_list.name: /simple/token_price/{id}
api_list.description: Get current price of tokens (using contract addresses) for a given platform in any other currency that you need.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of the platform issuing tokens (Only ethereum is supported for now)

required_parameters.name: vs_currencies
required_parameters.description: vs_currency of coins, comma-separated if querying more than 1 vs_currency *refers to simple/supported_vs_currencies

required_parameters.name: contract_addresses
required_parameters.description: The contract address of tokens, comma separated

optional_parameters.name: include_last_updated_at
optional_parameters.description: true/false to include last_updated_at of price
